C8Tech Maven Parent Java POM
Last Published: 2018-10-14  | Version: 4.2
Overview
  • Introduction
  • Usage

Project Modules

This project has declared the following modules:

Name Description
C8Tech Maven Parent OSGI POM The master parent POM aimed to set up the build of all C8Tech's OSGI Maven based projects.
C8Tech Maven Fragment POM for dependencies of a Felix container. A fragment POM that groups common dependencies needed by a node with Lunifera OSGi Subsystems. It is aimed to be imported by integration tests or distribution projects POMs.
C8Tech Maven Fragment POM for common OSGi dependencies. A fragment POM that groups common dependencies needed by a OSGi based container node. It is aimed to be imported by integration tests or distribution projects POMs.
C8Tech Maven Fragment POM for Pax-Exam based Integration Tests. A fragment POM that groups dependencies needed by integration tests projects based on PAX-Exam tool. It is aimed to be imported by other integration tests projects POMs.
C8Tech Maven Fragment POM for dependencies of a Equinox container. A fragment POM that groups dependencies related to Equinox container. It is aimed to be imported by integration tests or distribution projects POMs.
